summary_comment: Professor Chawanksy is known for her stringent grading standards, requiring students to provide thorough and critical analysis to achieve even high grades, with limited opportunities for extra credit. Students find her teaching style challenging and subjective, often perceiving her as unapproachable and lacking in clear direction.
summary_comment_short: Professor Chawanksy is known for her rigorous grading standards, requiring students to engage in thorough critical analysis to achieve high grades, which are challenging to obtain without significant effort. However, she has also been criticized for her teaching style, described as snappish and subjective, with some students finding her approach unhelpful and her direction lacking.

Ratings.comment: VERY HARD GRADER. Everything needs to be critically analyzed through and through in order for you to maybe get a 90%. Not a lot of point opportunities, must work hard for a decent grade. This class should not be as hard as it is. She should be teaching a higher level class for her expectations.

Worse Teacher Ever - Chip on Her Shoulder.  Snippy Emails. Made up class all subjective to her personal point of view.  Very little direction.  Left everything up to her Assistant.  Run Away from her!
